conbody.p: User's Guide provides step-by-step procedures for installation, configuration, deployment, management and troubleshooting of the data management system.

section.title: Intended Audience
section.p: User's Guide is intended for anyone who wants to install or deploy a system, including architects planning to use , developers programming their applications to use , and administrators who need to deploy and manage a distributed caching system. This guide assumes experience developing with Java.
